content:
The Dangling URL problem

  • The Web4Lib Problem

      ìI created a list of interesting sites for my usersÖ six months later, half the links didnít work! What can I do?î

      ìDonít worry, the URI committee is solving this problemÖ Location independent names!î

  • The URN solution: location-independent names:

    • Create a URN for the resource
    • Links include URNs instead of URLs
    • Tada! Problem solved!
